title: Staying Logged-In...
content: I can't seem to stay logged in, on my mac...(Mozilla1.7/osx.3) Same with safari.... I'm I missing something? :0
author: baskew

comments.content: shall do once i get back home.
Iam on a mac, exploer, whatever the new version is... i can never log in
Nope, can stay logged in... I just want to edit my profile... :0
